PGDay Australia

Melbourne - December 7th, 2018

About PGDay

The third Australian PostgreSQL conference. After the success of PGDay Australia 2017, we're back this year with PGDay Down Under. A one day conference and networking event, which brings together speakers from across the community to share the latest about Postgres news and updates. This year we have a fantastic line up of presenters with some of the most recognised PostgreSQL developers and experts. It's a fully catered event; morning and afternoon tea, lunch and drinks. This has been possible thanks to the generous contribution from our sponsors. Space is limited so make sure you register.

Venue

PWC Melbourne

Level 19/2 Riverside Quay, Southbank VIC 3006

www.pwc.com.au

Conveniently located in the city center

Follow Us on @PGDayAu
